This page walk through installation process of SMWBP components

= Installation =

== Core Components ==
1.1 Install Mediawiki (MW, 1.13)
  svn checkout http://svn.wikimedia.org/svnroot/mediawiki/branches/REL1_13/phase3

1.2 Install Semantic MediaWiki (SMW, 1.4)
  svn checkout http://svn.wikimedia.org/svnroot/mediawiki/trunk/extensions/SemanticMediaWiki/


== MW Extensions ==
2.1 VariablesExtension (http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Variables)
  svn checkout http://smwbp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/extensions/Variables/

2.2 StringFunctions (http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:StringFunctions)
  svn checkout http://svn.wikimedia.org/svnroot/mediawiki/trunk/extensions/StringFunctions/

2.3 ParserFunctions (http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:ParserFunctions)
  svn checkout http://svn.wikimedia.org/svnroot/mediawiki/trunk/extensions/ParserFunctions/

2.4 CategoryTree (http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:CategoryTree)
  svn checkout http://svn.wikimedia.org/svnroot/mediawiki/trunk/extensions/CategoryTree/

== SMW Extensions ==
3.1 Semantic Forms 
  svn checkout http://svn.wikimedia.org/svnroot/mediawiki/trunk/extensions/SemanticForms/

3.2 Semantic Result Format
  svn checkout http://svn.wikimedia.org/svnroot/mediawiki/trunk/extensions/SemanticResultFormats/

= Update =
move the the current wiki home, and run the following
{{{
svn update .
svn update extensions/SemanticMediaWiki/ 
svn update extensions/Variables/ 
svn update extensions/StringFunctions/ 
svn update extensions/ParserFunctions/ 
svn update extensions/CategoryTree/ 
svn update extensions/SemanticForms/ 
svn update extensions/SemanticResultFormats/ 
}}}
